value:
I'm from a small village called Silva.
It's in Grado. I thought I'd join up and
fight for my country...$k$pI just hope everybody back home is
doing all right.

I want to believe in justice. I want to
know I'm doing the right thing.

If you're worn out, let me help. I am a
soldier of sorts as well, you know.

Hey! Can you hear that songbird?
What a pretty voice it has! Let's get
closer and listen...

I admire General Duessel...and I train
every day in the hope that, someday,
I can be a little bit like him.

Your pal told me to come here...
$Nf, I mean!$k$pI hope you two stay close,
$Nu.
I have a lot of potential, don't I?

Day by day, I'm becoming a real
soldier!
Maybe I don't have what it takes...

I'm getting stronger? This is so
exciting!

Oh... Hello there! I'm a soldier in the
service of Grado. I'm a hard worker!
My name? Oh, right! It's Amelia.

Have I gotten stronger since I came
here? Do you think I'm a soldier now,
truly?$k$pTo me, a soldier is somebody who
can protect the people they care
about...$k$pYou see, when I was little...bandits
raided our village. They took my
mother.$k$pAnd I couldn't do a thing for her. I just
hid and watched, terrified. I...couldn't
protect her.$k$pThat's why I have to become
stronger. I need to be able to protect
the people who matter to me.$k$pThanks for listening,
$Nu.$k$pI hope you'll keep looking out for me.
No matter what, I swear that I will
protect those who I hold dear.
えいっ！
うんしょっ！
きゃああっ！
捕虜にされちゃう…
I'll do my best!
I'll protect everyone!
I am NOT scared!
Hyaah..? YAH!
Did I...give it my all?
Haha
I have to get stronger, to protect the people I care about.
AAAGH! ...Don't do that! My heart skipped a beat!
This armor is SO heavy. I feel like I'm going to tip over.

Take that! And that! Hyaah!

Ah! Were you watching me the whole time?
This is making me a little self-conscious.
Oh, Mother. If only... If only I had been stronger.
I want to become the shield that protects you.
Yep!
Allllll right!
I'm ready...
